title: How to Draw the Pink Panther

steps.headline: Draw the basic shapes to serve as guidelines for the rest of the drawing.
Draw two circles for the eyes.
Draw the shape of Pink Panther's head.
Draw Pink Panther's nose and mouth.
Draw Pink Panther's  arms.
Draw Pink Panther's legs.
Add in the details on the face of the eyebrows and whiskers.
Clean and remove the guidelines now.

text:
Draw the basic shapes to serve as guidelines for the rest of the drawing. Draw two circles for the eyes. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/63/Eyes-Step-2-6.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/6/63/Eyes-Step-2-6.jpg/v4-329px-Eyes-Step-2-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":313,"bigWidth":"329","bigHeight":"224","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Draw the shape of Pink Panther's head. Include the ears. Draw Pink Panther's nose and mouth. Draw Pink Panther's arms. Draw his left arm. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2c/Left-Arm-Step-5.jpg/v4-459px-Left-Arm-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/2/2c/Left-Arm-Step-5.jpg/aid1572079-v4-728px-Left-Arm-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":234,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"371","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Draw his right arm. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fd/Right-Arm-Step-6.jpg/v4-460px-Right-Arm-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/f/fd/Right-Arm-Step-6.jpg/aid1572079-v4-719px-Right-Arm-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":358,"bigWidth":"720","bigHeight":"560","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Draw Pink Panther's body. Draw Pink Panther's legs. Draw his right leg. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/da/Right-Leg-Step-8.jpg/v4-460px-Right-Leg-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/d/da/Right-Leg-Step-8.jpg/aid1572079-v4-625px-Right-Leg-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":412,"bigWidth":"626","bigHeight":"560","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Draw his left leg. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6b/Left-Leg-Step-9.jpg/v4-460px-Left-Leg-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/6/6b/Left-Leg-Step-9.jpg/aid1572079-v4-625px-Left-Leg-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":412,"bigWidth":"626","bigHeight":"560","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Draw Pink Panther's tail. Add in the details on the face of the eyebrows and whiskers. Outline to complete the lines. Shade as desired. Clean and remove the guidelines now.
